ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 139
ygData.msgSnippet: so does anyone know what the skill cap is for the lung? or even the rebreather? got 20 more pts to my skill..and will add more tonight(unless my friends are
ygData.messageBody:
so does anyone know what the skill cap is for the lung? or even the
rebreather? got 20 more pts to my skill..and will add more tonight(unless my
friends are gonna hit guk again..hehe got a de mask last night..I AM NOT
SHORT ANYMORE!!!) anyways...about what i said concerning the loss of
chaarges being a bug..IT IS. the crafted gauntlets post...hmm..well, the
only reason verant changed the merchant's payment to players is becuase
there is NOT ANY items in the game taht you can perchase then sell for more
to merchants. merchants are only there for item elimination..not for a
"market." verants also did this to increase the player economy..as players
wanting to make profit on the gloves would have to sell to other
players(unfortunately this back-fired because, 1. the gloves are easy to
get, and 2. the market was already flooded with them.)..soo anywyas..what is
a good skill lvl to make Lungs at? thx.
-Ranth , Tarew Marr
